recipesJson.name: Chocolate Milk: A Golden Ticket REMIX
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Do like it.    Just kiddin Mr-G :D for me this beats out 95% of all chocolate vapes tried. Well rounded chocolate and cream flavor...no band aid flavor...well balanced with nice sweetness
Haven't tried it yet but banana sounds like a good add or maybe even berries strawberry etc....
Very Good. I haven't tasted the original so I can not compare but it tastes like Nestle Quick to me.
great recipe, very close to original.
I think this tastes better than actual Metix Golden Ticket.  Great flavor but I get tired of it pretty fast, like the store-bought version it seems to leave you wanting something.

One of the top mixed recipes on site yet 1 review? So i will add my 1 cent since I'm new and don't get 2. I mix it up now and then its pretty good. Not a Nestl√© chocolate milk more of a yoohoo to me. Kinda goes good with my coffee in the mornings.

This is a pretty good chocolate milkshake vape. With the lack of good chocolate flavorings on the market, Wayne did a good job of hitting that chocolate shake profile with this recipe. The custard and EM do a good job of hiding the tootsie-roll flavor from double choc, while adding some body to the vanilla swirl "milkshake".
